<!-- Autogenerated by mlir-tblgen; don't manually edit -->

### `-convert-ion-to-llvm`

_Perform a dialect conversion from ion to LLVM_

### `-gates-to-pulses`

_Lower quantum gates to ionic pulses._

#### Options

```
-device-toml-loc        : Toml file location for the ion hardware device parameters.
-qubit-toml-loc         : Toml file location for the ion hardware qubit parameters.
-gate-to-pulse-toml-loc : Toml file location for the ion hardware gate-to-pulse decomposition parameters.
-load-ion               : Whether to load the physical parameters for the ion (e.g. mass, charge, spin) into the IR.
```
